events.name: Glorious Victory
events.description: A special event where players compete to earn points and claim valuable rewards including gems, spirit badges, spirit shards, and research speedups. Defeat Shattered Skull Fortresses of different levels to earn points - higher levels give more points! ⏰ **Event ends in 1 day 9 hours 18 minutes and 30 seconds!**
mechanics: Defeat Shattered Skull Fortresses for points:
tips: Focus on daily objectives for consistent point gains
Coordinate with your alliance for better rewards
Save speedups for the final push
Prioritize activities that give the most points per time invested
Target higher level Shattered Skull Fortresses for better point efficiency
Level 6 fortresses give the most points (60) but may be harder to defeat
Level 4 fortresses offer good point-to-difficulty ratio (45 points)
Coordinate with alliance members to take down higher level fortresses together
requirements: Must be in an active alliance

events.name: Purification
events.description: The Shattered Skulls who follow Father Glowworm are gradually increasing in Power. You must build your strength, lead your benders and heroes, and defeat the Shattered Skulls step by step to purify the land. This progressive challenge event tests your strategic planning, resource management, and alliance coordination skills.
mechanics: Progressive Challenge: Each level must be completed before advancing to the next
Shattered Skull Types: Different enemy types (Fuzhi, Toghrul, Amur, Lushan, Kyro, Chanyu) with varying difficulty
Alliance Cooperation: Work with alliance members to defeat higher-level enemies
Resource Management: Balance your resources between progression and other activities
Time Management: Complete tasks efficiently within the 3-day event window
Level Requirements: Must be level 15+ to participate
Alliance Requirement: Must be in an active alliance
tips: Early Focus: Complete lower levels quickly to build momentum
Alliance Coordination: Coordinate with alliance members for higher-level challenges
Resource Planning: Save speedups and resources for the final push
Level Progression: Focus on completing one level at a time rather than spreading resources
Timing: Start the event early to maximize completion time
Alliance Support: Use alliance rallies for higher-level enemies
Resource Efficiency: Prioritize levels that give the best reward-to-difficulty ratio
Progress Saving: Your progress is saved between event sessions
requirements: Must be in an active alliance
Must have basic understanding of combat mechanics
